name: Cop & Robbers
description:
Team: Emmäkeksi

Multiplayer game were cop trying to catch bad guys. The game was made for Tite Jam #eleven with Unity and PhotonEngine Pun 2. Sorry this game includes some issues. This is just first prototype of this game. Game is still under the development.
